subject: Singing
description: Learn the basics of vocal technique, breathing, and pitch control.

subject: Singing
description: Improve tone, expand vocal range, and master simple harmonies.

subject: Singing
description: Focus on performance, advanced vocal agility, and stage presence.

subject: Piano
description: Introduction to keys, scales, and simple melodies.

subject: Piano
description: Learn chord progressions, sight-reading, and dynamic control.

subject: Piano
description: Master complex pieces, improvisation, and performance techniques.

subject: Violin
description: Learn posture, bowing, and basic finger placement.

subject: Violin
description: Develop vibrato, shifting positions, and ensemble playing.

subject: Violin
description: Focus on advanced techniques, concert repertoire, and expression.

subject: Guitar
description: Learn basic chords, strumming patterns, and simple songs.

subject: Guitar
description: Explore fingerpicking, barre chords, and rhythm techniques.

subject: Guitar
description: Master soloing, improvisation, and advanced styles.

subject: Drums
description: Learn basic beats, timing, and coordination.

subject: Drums
description: Develop fills, syncopation, and dynamic control.

subject: Drums
description: Focus on complex rhythms, polyrhythms, and performance skills.
